channel.title: Peom on Andrew E Brereton
channel.description: Recent content in Peom on Andrew E Brereton

item.title: Winter
item.description: No wonder then, that Winter feels so unreal; when the trees finally fall to their dreaming, leaving the warm-blooded to their feverish movements, like scratches of ink on a clean white page.

item.title: Evening Sky
Rainfall
item.description: Gray skies and the soft rains fall to tear the earth and tease the trees to struggle for heights. Dimly then their scent recalls in short sweet bursts old bitter dreams of ancient paradise. Now alone amidst the sounds of endless drips upon the ground; remember, there is no rest and no respite but only tired and dim gray light.
